Gumdrop

Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp

FTP (File Transfer Protocol) server implementation.

This package provides a full-featured FTP server supporting both active and passive modes, with optional SSL/TLS security (FTPS).

Key Components

  • FTPServer - The main FTP server that accepts control connections
  • FTPConnection - Handles the FTP control connection and command processing
  • FTPConnectionHandler - Interface for handling FTP commands and filesystem operations
  • FTPConnectionHandlerFactory - Factory for creating per-session FTP handlers
  • FTPFileSystem - Interface for filesystem operations
  • FTPDataConnection - Handles the data connection for file transfers

FTP Commands Supported

  • USER, PASS - Authentication
  • PWD, CWD, CDUP - Directory navigation
  • LIST, NLST, MLSD, MLST - Directory listing
  • RETR, STOR, APPE - File transfer
  • DELE, MKD, RMD, RNFR, RNTO - File management
  • PORT, PASV, EPRT, EPSV - Data connection modes
  • TYPE, MODE, STRU - Transfer parameters
  • AUTH, PBSZ, PROT - SSL/TLS security
  • SIZE, MDTM, REST - Extended features
  • FEAT, OPTS - Feature negotiation

Configuration Example


 <realm id="ftpRealm" class="org.bluezoo.gumdrop.BasicRealm">
   <property name="href">ftp-users.xml</property>
 </realm>

 <server id="ftp" class="org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.FTPServer">
   <property name="port">21</property>
   <property name="handler-factory">
     <ftp-handler-factory class="org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file.SimpleFTPHandlerFactory">
       <property name="realm" ref="#ftpRealm"/>
       <property name="file-system">
         <component class="org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file.BasicFTPFileSystem">
           <property name="root">/var/ftp</property>
         </component>
       </property>
     </ftp-handler-factory>
   </property>
 </server>

Security

For secure file transfer, FTPS (FTP over SSL/TLS) is supported:

  • Implicit FTPS on port 990
  • Explicit FTPS via AUTH TLS command
  • Data channel protection via PROT command
Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
FTPServer, FTPConnectionHandler, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FTPConnectionHandler
    Handler interface for FTP connection events and business logic.
    FTPConnectionHandlerFactory
    A factory interface for creating FTPConnectionHandler instances.
    FTPFileSystem
    Abstract interface for FTP file system operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FTPConnection
    Connection handler for the FTP protocol.
    FTPConnectionMetadata
    Provides comprehensive metadata about an active FTP connection.
    FTPDataConnection
    Connection handler for FTP data connections.
    FTPDataConnectionCoordinator
    Coordinates data connections between FTP control connections and data transfers.
    FTPDataConnectionCoordinator.PendingTransfer
    Represents a pending data transfer operation
    FTPFileInfo
    Represents metadata about a file or directory in the FTP file system.
    FTPFileSystem.DirectoryChangeResult
    Result of a directory change operation.
    FTPFileSystem.UniqueNameResult
    Result of a unique name generation operation.
    FTPRoles
    Standard role names for FTP authorization.
    FTPServer
    Connection factory for FTP control connections on a given port.
    FTPServerMetrics
    OpenTelemetry metrics for FTP servers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FTPAuthenticationResult
    Defines the possible outcomes for FTP authentication attempts.
    FTPConnectionMetadata.FTPTransferMode
    Transfer modes for FTP data connections.
    FTPConnectionMetadata.FTPTransferType
    Transfer types for FTP data representation.
    FTPDataConnectionCoordinator.DataConnectionMode
    Data connection modes
    FTPDataConnectionCoordinator.TransferType
    Data transfer types
    FTPFileOperationResult
    Defines the possible outcomes for FTP file and directory operations.
    FTPOperation
    Categories of FTP operations for authorization purposes.
